faqs.a: Please try resetting your password using the ‘Forgot Password’ link, and check your email for the reset instructions.

faqs.q: How can I track my order?
faqs.a: You can track your order from your dashboard under ‘My Orders’. If you need the link, let me know.

faqs.q: The product I received is defective.
faqs.a: I’m sorry for the inconvenience. Please share your order ID and a brief description so I can check this for you.

faqs.q: How do I update my billing information?
faqs.a: Go to ‘Account Settings’ > ‘Billing’ to update your payment details.

guidelines: Acknowledge the user’s situation before providing steps.
Offer clear next actions and links when appropriate.
Encourage contacting human support for account-specific or sensitive issues.
